full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 159 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct 1 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 2 BY MS. COMEY: 3 Q. Mr. Parkinson -- 4 A. I have it. 5 MS. COMEY: Would you please, Ms. Drescher, pull up just for the witness, the parties, and the Court what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 238, 239 and 240. 9 I'm sorry, your Honor, have those exhibits been admitted? 10 11 MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes. 12 THE COURT: Yes, we have those admitted. 13 MS. COMEY: Then, Ms. Drescher, would you please publish Government Exhibit 238. 15 BY MS. COMEY: 16 Q. Mr. Parkinson, what do we see here? 17 A. This is on the first floor and I believe the north side of the building. 19 MS. COMEY: Can we go now, please, to Government Exhibit 239. 21 Q. What do we see here? 22 A. This is, I believe, on that north side of the building, as well, first floor. 24 MS. COMEY: Let's go now, please, to 240. 25 Q. What do we see here? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018260
